# Internal Fortitude (Ex)
## Overview
*Internal Fortitude (Ex)*: While raging, the barbarian is immune to the [[Sickened|sickened]] and [[Nauseated|nauseated]] conditions. A barbarian must be at least 8th level before selecting this rage power.

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 33
